text:
@thehill Juvenile president!
Saving a special bottle of wine, 
a lovely merlot, to be enjoyed when Trump leaves the office formerly held by many good respected men - which he is not!

After Covid-19 & everything else done by this petty Liar & Cheat, there'll be
DANCING IN THE STREETS!
